original_text: I will attack the people of Babylonia, and I will chase them out of their land. I will do that like a lion that has been hiding in the forest. It attacks the sheep in the fields beside the Jordan River. Like that lion, I will suddenly chase Babylonia's people out of their country. Then I will choose a leader to rule that nation. There is nobody who is like me. Nobody can accuse me of anything. No ruler can stand against me. I will attack the people of Babylonia, and I will chase them out of their land. korean_text: 보라 사자가 요단의 깊은 숲에서 나타나듯이 그가 와서 견고한 처소를 칠 것이라 내가 즉시 그들을 거기에서 쫓아내고 택한 자를 내가 그 자리에 세우리니 나와 같은 자 누구며 출두하라고 나에게 명령할 자가 누구며 내 앞에 설 목자가 누구냐

sentences.original_text: I will attack the people of Babylonia
and I will chase them out of their land
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들을 그들의 땅에서 쫓아낼 것이다

sentences.original_text: I will do that like a lion
that has been hiding in the forest
It attacks the sheep in the fields
I will suddenly chase Babylonia's people
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 갑자기 바빌로니아 백성을 쫓을 것이다

sentences.original_text: Then I will choose a leader
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 나는 한 지도자를 선택할 것이다

sentences.original_text: There is nobody who is like me
Nobody can accuse me of anything
sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 나를 아무것으로도 고소할 수 없다

sentences.original_text: No ruler can stand against me
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 통치자도 나에게 맞설 수 없다
